General.Name: MX Gold Corp
General.Description: MX Gold Corp. does not have significant operations. Previously, it was engaged in the mining business. The company was formerly known as Discovery Ventures Inc. and changed its name to MX Gold Corp. in June 2016. MX Gold Corp. was incorporated in 1999 and is headquartered in Winnipeg, Canada.
General.Address: 1300 Redonda Street, Winnipeg, MB, Canada, R2C 3T7
